body.p: In developing the 2018 Conceptual Framework, the Board concluded that for a liability to exist, three criteria must all be satisfied:

li.p: the entity has an obligation (see paragraphs BC4.47–BC4.61);
the obligation is to transfer an economic resource (see paragraphs BC4.62–BC4.63); and
the obligation is a present obligation that exists as a result of past events (see paragraphs BC4.64–BC4.68).
